name: I Spent 5 DAYS on America's Longest Greyhound Bus. It Was HELL.
description:
Thank you to BetterHelp for sponsoring this video. Get 10% off your first month at https://betterhelp.com/noel
I spent 5 days onboard America's longest Greyhound bus from New York to Los Angeles. it was absolute hell. Thank you  @ZacAlsop  for your words of advice!
